name: Rose
care: Requires full sun, well-drained soil. Water regularly. Prune to encourage blooming.

name: Tulip
care: Plant in well-drained soil. Water moderately. Provide full sun to partial shade.

name: Lily
care: Plant in rich, well-drained soil. Water generously. Prefers partial to full sun.

name: Daisy
care: Thrives in well-drained soil. Water regularly. Prefers full sun.

name: Orchid
care: Grow in well-draining orchid mix. Water sparingly. Provide bright, indirect light.

name: Carnation
care: Plant in well-drained soil. Water regularly. Prefers full to partial sun.

name: Daffodil
care: Plant in well-drained soil. Water moderately. Requires partial to full sun.

name: Sunflower
care: Plant in well-drained soil. Water moderately. Requires partial to full sun.
